Items.Name: Mat
Items.LookDescription: A rubber mat saying 'Welcome to Zork!' lies here.

Items.Name: Mailbox
Items.LookDescription: There is a small mailbox here.

Rooms.Name: West of House
Rooms.Description: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

Rooms.Name: North of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: South of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: Behind House
Rooms.Description: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

Rooms.Name: Forest 1
Rooms.Description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

Rooms.Name: Forest 2
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands here.

Rooms.Name: Forest 3
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

Rooms.Name: Clearing
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on the west and south.

Rooms.Name: Up a Tree
Rooms.Description: You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches. The nearest branch above you is above your reach.
